name: Forgotten Treasure 2
description:
Great game genre match 3! Collect crystals and gold, get all the ancient treasures!

In addition to a nice graphics and sound, you will find a huge number of levels, lots of treasures, various bonuses and obstacles, and much more!

Overcome all obstacles to unseen relics, adventurers will be richly rewarded!

Embark on an adventure and remember - the treasures are waiting for you!
